title: Edinburgh Fringe funniest joke: Masai Graham wins with food pun
description: The comedian's pun beat nine other one-liners to be voted the winner at the Edinburgh Fringe.

title: Kashmir Hindus on edge after resurgence of targeted killings
description: Kashmiri Hindus who returned to the region as part of a resettlement programme want to leave again.

title: Do new school uniform rules save parents money?
description: Schools now have to take unnecessary logos off uniforms, but so far not all parents are benefitting.

title: Wrexham AFC: Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney document first season
description: Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney star in a documentary about their first season as football club owners

title: Why are these Americans turning in (some of) their guns?
description: When police in Texas offered to buy back unwanted firearms, gun owners of all kinds showed up.

title: Ukraine war: Russia appeals for new recruits for war effort
description: Hefty rewards are offered to volunteers to sign up as the army sees significant losses in Ukraine.

title: Wargaming a North Korean attack
description: The US and South Korea are doing drills to practise fighting a war against an increasingly hostile North Korea.

title: European Championships Munich 2022: Great Britain win 60 medals to finish second in medal table
description: Great Britain finish with 60 medals at the European Championships, while a further 27 are won at the European Aquatics Championships.

title: Alan Shearer column: Ex-Newcastle captain says his old side could be 'best of rest'
description: Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer says these are exciting times for Newcastle - and that they could be the best of the rest in the Premier League this season.

title: The Hundred - Norther Superchargers v Manchester Originals: Plays of the day
description: Watch the best of Sunday's Hundred action as Norther Superchargers hosted Manchester Originals at Headingley.

title: Man Utd v Liverpool: Toxic mood, ‘witches curse’ & being winless – everything you need to know
description: Fierce rivals Manchester United and Liverpool meet at Old Trafford on Monday after underwhelming starts to the season by both clubs.

title: European Championships: Great Britain win men's 4x100m relay gold
description: Watch as Great Britain break the championship record to win gold in the men's 4x100m relay on the final day of the European Championships in Munich.

title: BTec delays: 'If it was A-levels this would've been sorted quicker'
description: BTec students describe the stress and confusion of being left in limbo by delays to their results.

title: Rubbish-strewn streets as Edinburgh strike kicks in
description: Fringe street performers are picking litter as rubbish piles up in Edinburgh during strike action.

title: Darya Dugina: Daughter of Putin ally killed in Moscow blast
description: A car carrying Alexander Dugin's daughter exploded on the outskirts of Moscow, investigators say.

title: Nationalised energy should be an option, says Sturgeon
description: Scotland's first minister says all options should be on the table to tackle crisis in energy costs.

title: Somalia hotel siege: Security forces say al-Shabab attack is over
description: Twenty-one people were killed after al-Shabab militants took hostages in a popular Mogadishu hotel.

title: Felixstowe: Strike begins at UK's biggest container port
description: Workers at Felixstowe, which handles half of the country's container cargo, are walking out for eight days.

title: In Pictures: Festivities as Zulu King Misuzulu ka Zwelithini is crowned
description: Pictures from the festivities as Zulu King Misuzulu ka Zwelithini is crowned in South Africa.

title: Foo Fighters guitar expected to fetch £30k at Wiltshire auction
description: A guitar used by the band's frontman Dave Grohl is going under the hammer in Wiltshire.

title: Over-50s turn to house-shares to beat rising rents
description: One flat-sharing website says it has seen a 239% increase in older people seeking shared accommodation.

title: Oleksandr Usyk v Anthony Joshua 2: Ukrainian calls out Tyson Fury after victory
description: Oleksandr Usyk calls out Tyson Fury after defending his heavyweight titles against Anthony Joshua in Saudi Arabia.

title: India monsoon rains cause fatal bridge collapse
description: A bridge collapses in India following seasonal rains in Kangra, Himachal Pradesh, killing at least two people.

title: Owami Davies: Met Police spoke to woman on day of missing report
description: Owami Davies was reported missing on 6 July but had contact with police on the same day.

title: UFC 278: Leon Edwards shocks Kamaru Usman to win UFC welterweight title
description: Leon Edwards sensationally knocks out Kamaru Usman to win the welterweight title at UFC 278.

title: Port of Felixstowe strike will cost us a stack of money - haulier
description: Companies talk of how they expect the eight-day strike at the Port of Felixstowe to affect them.

title: Map may show evidence of Wales' Atlantis off Ceredigion
description: The legend of Wales' Atlantis has long been considered myth, but is there some truth to it?

title: The Papers: Tory fears as 'Labour surges', and 'Wasteminster'
description: Many of Sunday's papers tackle the cost of living crisis, from its impact on the polls to food waste.

title: Oleksandr Usyk v Anthony Joshua 2: Briton in tears after heavyweight defeat
description: An emotional Anthony Joshua wipes away tears after losing his heavyweight world title rematch with Oleksandr Usyk in Saudi Arabia on Saturday.

title: Oleksandr Usyk v Anthony Joshua 2: Briton becomes emotional in post-fight news conference after loss
description: Anthony Joshua breaks down in his post-fight news conference after losing his heavyweight world title rematch with Oleksandr Usyk in Saudi Arabia.

title: Barristers voting on all-out strike call
description: The industrial action, which follows weeks of walkouts in England and Wales, would start on 5 September.

title: Oleksandr Usyk v Anthony Joshua 2: Briton loses world title rematch by split decision
description: Briton Anthony Joshua's bid to recapture the unified heavyweight titles ends in disappointment as Oleksandr Usyk produces a terrific performance to win by split decision in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
